description: Contains information on electronically made payments.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the transaction record.

columns.name: RESPONSE_TAG
columns.description: Authorization code sent back by the merchant

columns.name: APPROVAL_CODE
columns.description: Transaction ID sent back by the merchant

columns.name: PMT_INSTANT_DTTM
columns.description: Instant at which the electronic payment was made.

columns.name: CARD_BRAND_C_NAME
columns.description:
The card brand category ID used for the transaction.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Visa


MasterCard


American Express


Discover


Diners Club


Health Benefit


Bank Account (Unknown Type)


Checking Account


Savings Account


Other

columns.name: TOKEN_NICKNAME
columns.description: A helpful name to identify the payment method.

columns.name: ACCT_HOLDER_NAME
columns.description: The name of the credit card account holder or bank account holder.

columns.name: LAST_4_DIGITS
columns.description: The last 4 digits of the card or bank account used for the transaction.

columns.name: BANK_ACCT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The bank account type for bank account transactions.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Unknown


Checking


Savings

columns.name: DIGITAL_WALLET_C_NAME
columns.description:
Holds the digital wallet used for an electronic payment. Stored on payments made from a digital wallet and on reversals. This item is not stored on refund transactions.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Apple Pay


Google Pay

columns.name: SAVED_PMT_DIGITAL_WALLET_C_NAME
columns.description:
Holds the digital wallet of the saved payment method used to make the payment 


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: DIGITAL_WALLET_C_NAME
